metadata.title: CVE-2019-6991 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A classic Stack-based buffer overflow exists in the zmLoadUser() functionin zm_user.cpp of the zmu binary in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing anunauthenticated attacker to execute code via a long username.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
